text.text: A MIRAI Timeline of EV Relay News

media.caption: Annual EV sales have surges tenfold in the wake of the Covid pandemic.(credits)

text.headline: Annual EV sales up “tenfold” post-pandemic, says VWFS
text.text: Research from Volkswagen Financial Services UK (VWFS) shows that annual finance cases for electric vehicles (BEV/PHEV/HEV) increased 1,062% from July 2019 to July 2022. The percentage of electric vehicles financed by the car...(Read more

text.headline: EV battery recycling – circular economy charges up
text.text: Soaring demand for electric vehicles adds market support for greater EV battery recycling. Read more

media.caption: Indonesia's Indika, Taiwan's Foxconn mull EV partnership with Thai firm (credits)

text.headline: Indonesia's Indika, Taiwan's Foxconn mull EV partnership with Thai firm
text.text: Coal miner PT Indika Energy (INDY.JK) and Taiwan-based Foxconn (2317.TW), which are partnering to make electric vehicles in Indonesia, are considering bringing in a Thai Read more

media.caption: Toyota considers sharp boost in output of first EV, but not before 2025, sources say (credits)

text.headline: Toyota considers sharp boost in output of first EV, but not before 2025, sources say
text.text: Toyota is considering a sharp increase in production of its first mass-market battery-electric vehicle from 2025, according to three people with knowledge of the developing plans, ramping up output of the vehicle amid a broader strategy rethink. Read more

media.caption: LG Chem is going to build a $3B EV battery cathode factory – the largest in the US (credits)

text.headline: LG Chem is going to build a $3B EV battery cathode factory – the largest in the US
text.text: LG Chem today announced that it has signed a memorandum of understanding with the state of Tennessee to build a $3 billion cathode factory for electric vehicles. Read more

media.caption: China Considers Extending its EV Subsidies to 2023 (updated) – the largest in the US (credits)

text.headline: China Considers Extending its EV Subsidies to 2023 (updated) – the largest in the US
text.text: China EV subsidies could be extended if the government considers it necessary to stimulate the market, besides tackling slow growth in the auto industry. Read more

media.caption: Australia will target carbon emissions from vehicles to boost the uptake of electric cars, which account for just 2% of new-auto sales in the country. (credits)

text.headline: Australia Targets Emissions to Boost Electric-Car Uptake
text.text: Australia will target carbon emissions from vehicles to boost the uptake of electric cars, which account for just 2% of new-auto sales in the country. Read more

media.caption: Govt considers reducing incentives for electric commercial vehicles (credits)

text.headline: Govt considers reducing incentives for electric commercial vehicles
text.text: SINGAPORE - Buyers of commercial vehicles are likely to get smaller tax rebates if they switch to electric models after next March, under a change to the Commercial Vehicle Emissions Scheme (CVES) proposed by the National Environment Agency. Read more

media.caption: Toyota Motor to invest $5.3 bln in Japan, U.S. for EV battery supply (credits)

text.headline: Toyota Motor to invest $5.3 bln in Japan, U.S. for EV battery supply
text.text: Aug 31 (Reuters) - Toyota Motor Corp (7203.T)said on Wednesday it would invest up to 730 billion yen ($5.27 billion) in Japan and the United States to make batteries for fully electric vehicles, a category of automobile that critics say it has been slow to embrace. Read more

media.caption: SK On expects to play a central role in supplying Ford’s future EV battery requirements worldwide (credits)

text.headline: SK, Ford launch new battery JV
text.text: SK On expects to play a central role in supplying Ford’s future EV battery requirements worldwide Read more

media.caption: German coalition parties agree to reduce EV subsidies and scrap plug-in hybrid incentives (credits)

text.headline: Germany will reduce electric car subsidies as EV sales rise
text.text: German coalition parties agree to reduce EV subsidies and scrap plug-in hybrid incentives Read more

media.caption: Customers of China’s BYD, the largest electric vehicle (EV) maker by sales, have taken the unusual step of urging regulators to expand a battery replacement recall to safeguard the reputation of a national champion. (credits)

text.headline: Mystery surrounds BYD battery recalls
text.text: Customers of China’s BYD, the largest electric vehicle (EV) maker by sales, have taken the unusual step of urging regulators to expand a battery replacement recall to safeguard the reputation of a national champion. Read more

media.caption: Alsym Energy, a seven-year-old Massachusetts startup, aims to halve the cost of electric vehicle batteries with a new design that eliminates lithium and cobalt, two increasingly costly ingredients in many current EV batteries, the company said on Wednesday. (credits)

text.headline: EV battery startup Alsym aims to slash cost, eliminate lithium and cobalt
text.text: Alsym Energy, a seven-year-old Massachusetts startup, aims to halve the cost of electric vehicle batteries with a new design that eliminates lithium and cobalt, two increasingly costly ingredients in many current EV batteries, the company said on Wednesday. Read more

media.caption: Chinese battery mogul Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. (CATL) just unveiled an electric car battery with a range of over 1,000 kilometers (620 miles) on a single charge and is 13% more powerful than one expected by Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ: TSLA), a major customer. (credits)

text.headline: Chinese Battery Giant Launches EV Battery With One-Charge Range of Over 1,000 KM
text.text: Chinese battery mogul Contemporary Amperex Technology Co. Ltd. (CATL) just unveiled an electric car battery with a range of over 1,000 kilometers (620 miles) on a single charge and is 13% more powerful than one expected by Tesla Inc. (NASDAQ: TSLA), a major customer. Read more

media.caption: Polestar has reported that the world premiere of its next car, the Polestar 3 electric performance SUV, will be in October 2022. Polestar 3 is the company’s first SUV. (credits)

text.headline: Polestar to unveil electric performance SUV, Polestar 3, in October 2022
text.text: Polestar has reported that the world premiere of its next car, the Polestar 3 electric performance SUV, will be in October 2022. Polestar 3 is the company’s first SUV. Read more
